name: Defend The Snowhouse
description:
THIS  2D GAME WAS MADE  FOR THE BLACK AND WHITE JAM

The theme of this Game Jam was SNOW.

  • Description 

Snow Monsters attacked your village in an unknown night. Next target is your house !!!

Kill all the Snow Monsters with your Gun and eliminate them.

Don't let monsters reach your house or else you will lose the game!!!

  • Controls

A and D -  To move Left and Right

Spacebar - to jump 

Left Mouse Click - to shoot

  • Credits

Sounds were used from freesound.r

  •  Instructions

Play in Full Screen for best Experience.

Comment down below your Highest Kill Count !
